ActPayments in Lieu of Taxes Act
PrecisReappointment of RAFFI ANDREI BALMANOUKIAN of New Glasgow, Nova Scotia, as a member of the Payments in Lieu of Taxes Dispute Advisory Panel, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective May 9, 2022.
